name: chimpspoker.com
short_description:
Poker is a card game, which involves betting and gambling. You decide on the betting frequency or the rate of betting, based on your winning or losing streak. If you are on a winning spree, increase the rate of bet. If you see that you are losing more, then decrease the betting frequency.
There are number of types of bets that you can make, depending on the scope and significance of the bet. The three prominent betting options are preflop betting, limping and over-limping.
PREFLOP BETTING: While playing a poker Hold’em game, the initial two bets that are made in the pot, are called the forced bet. These are also called as “blinds”, as the players will bet, without looking at their cards. After betting, they can fold or raise or call, without checking your card. The first person who checks the card opens or starts the game.
LIMPING: Limping is a poker term used, when a player tries to play, betting a big blind.
